text: 6: And a Spring Forever Gone
trans: 无法来临的春天

text: Krelkulkil arrives at the estate with Osada and Garoza following close behind. The father-daughter pair, later joined by the crew, keeps the X-factor slivers unleashed by the elder at bay while Krelkulkil rushes to find Corwell.
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔来到了宅邸，阿贞和加罗萨紧跟其后，当卡拉库拉奇尔寻找克洛威尔的时候，长老放出了【何物的碎片】，这对父女随后与众人一起将其消灭在庭院中。

text: Corwell is scheduled to have his X-factor sliver extracted so that the demon blade can be reclaimed by the crew.
trans: 按照计划，克洛威尔体内的【何物的碎片】被抽取出来后，众人就可以让妖刀物归原主。

text: While the crew rests for tomorrow's extraction, Krelkulkil stands outside the mansion's gate under the cover of darkness.
trans: 就在众人为了第二天的抽取做准备而歇息的时候，卡拉库拉奇尔趁着夜色的掩护出现在了宅邸外面。

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: Osada. Garoza.
trans: 阿贞，加罗萨。

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Oh, crap!
trans: 唔诶！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: H-how did you know we were here, Bruv?
trans: 你怎么知道我们在这里，卡拉库拉奇尔小哥？

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: You've looked after me for a long time. That's more than enough.
trans: 一直以来受你们照顾，已经足够了。

text: And with those words, Krelkulkil uses the demon blade's power to jump over the mansion's fence.
trans: 说完这些话，卡拉库拉奇尔用妖刀强化过得力量越过了宅邸的围墙。

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Well, that's that. Let's go home, Osada.
trans: ……这就完事了，我们回去吧，阿贞。

name: Osada/阿贞
text: What did you say? You're just going to let him go alone after all we've been through?
trans: 你在胡说些什么！到了这个关头，你打算让小哥一个人进去吗！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Think about it, Osada. If we go after him, we'll definitely be trespassin'.
trans: 因为啊，阿贞，如果我们跟着进去的话，可是非法闯入哦？

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Geez, Louise! How pathetic can you get? There's not an ounce of courage in my old man!
trans: 啊！真没出息！就你这样也算是男子汉吗？

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Okay, go ahead. Run home, Pops! Me and Bruv will go on ahead!
trans: 好吧，老爸就赶快跑回家吧！我要和小哥一起进去！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Wha... What! Think about what you're saying, Osada!
trans: 哈……哈？你在说什么啊，阿贞！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Why go that far for someone you know nothin' about? Not to mention his sickness and how antisocial he is!
trans: 那个看上去一脸病恹恹的，脾气还不好的人，为什么要掺和到他的事情里去啊！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Because he's a good person!
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔小哥，无疑是一个非常好的人！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Good people deserve to be treated with kindness!
trans: 好人就必须得到善待！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: I can't assume the worst in people all the time like you do, Pops!
trans: 像妈妈一样温柔的人……不应该遭受可怕的事情！

text: Osada speaks her mind, then tries to push open a side door of the main gate.
trans: 阿贞说出了她的心声，随后用力试图打开大门旁边的小门。

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Hrrnggh!
trans: 咕咕……！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Sigh...

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Pops?
trans: 老爸？

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text:
Must've picked up that attitude at some point when you were younger...
I'll open the door, and we'll go together.
trans: 你还是跟以前一样啊……我会把门打开的，走吧，阿贞！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Yay, Pops!
trans: 老爸！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: You and him are both like dogs who won't give up their bones...
trans: 你和他都一样是这么永不言弃的性格啊，真是的。

name: Elder/老人
text: The reflection in the water is reacting. This color must be Krelkulkil's demon blade.
trans: 水之镜起了反应……这个颜色，是卡拉库拉奇尔的妖刀吗。

name: Elder/老人
text: If only you hadn't returned here...
trans: 明明不要回来就好了。

text: In response to Krelkulkil's intrusion into the mansion, the elder unlocks a chest in the corner of the room.
trans: 意识到卡拉库拉奇尔到来的长老，用钥匙打开了一个房间角落的箱子。

text: Something thick and heavy spills from the chest and slithers out into the corridor leading to the garden.
trans: 一个沉重的，像影子般漆黑的东西从箱子里爬了出来，穿过走廊，来到花园里。

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: Is that an X-factor sliver? Must be Grandfather's doing.
trans: 【何物的碎片】吗，是爷爷啊。

name: X-Factor Sliver/何物的碎片
text: Oouugh...
trans: 呜呜呜呜……哦哦哦……

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: You think you can stop me?
trans: 你以为你能阻挡得了我吗。

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: What a splendid banquet, Grandfather.
trans: 真是大手笔啊，爷爷。

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: But slivers are no match for the true power that lies within a demon blade!
trans: 但是说到底也是碎片，根本不是拥有完整力量的妖刀的对手！

name: X-Factor Sliver/何物的碎片
text: Bwooh...
trans: 唔。

name: Osada/阿贞
text: G-get away from here, you nasties! Stay out of Bruv's way!
trans: 滚开你这怪物！不要妨碍卡拉库拉奇尔小哥！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Silly girl! What's a rock gonna do against monsters like that!
trans: 傻……傻孩子阿贞！向怪物扔石头什么的……！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Go, Bruv! We'll handle things here!
trans: 卡拉库拉奇尔小哥，快走！这里就交给我们！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Excuuuse me? You're asking for Pops to do the impossible! I can't even pretend to fight! No way, no how!
trans: 啊！老爸不行的！打架什么的做不来的！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: It's fine! Just go!
trans: 别愣着了快走！

name: Krelkulkil/卡拉库拉奇尔
text: I owe you one!
trans: 多谢！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Noooo! Mister Krelkulkil, don't leave me!
trans: 啊啊，卡拉库拉奇尔老爷，别走啊！

name: X-Factor Sliver/何物的碎片
text: Oooo...
trans: 哦哦……！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Hey, you! We're over here!
trans: 来啊！在这里！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: You guys hear that? Something's goin' down!
trans: 刚才的声音是什么？发生了什么事情！

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: It came from over here!
trans: 从这边传来的！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text:
Gasp! Someone's coming!
Please save us, whoever you are!
trans: 啊，有人来了，救命啊！

name: X-Factor Sliver/何物的碎片
text: Oooo...

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Whoa! What kinda monster is that? Hey, you two all right over there?
trans: 啊，这怪物是什么啊！你们两个，都没事吧？

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: Do I look okay? Step into a garden, and what do ya get? A freakin' monster! Come save our bacon!
trans: 看起来像是没事吗？刚进院子，就看到个怪物！救救我们啊！

name: X-Factor Sliver/何物的碎片
text: Ooooo!
trans: 哦哦哦哦哦哦！

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Aaah!
trans: 呀！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Watch out!
trans: 危险！

text: 姬塔 rushes in front of Osada, takes the monster's charge, and deflects its attack.
trans: 姬塔挡在阿贞面前，挡住了怪物的攻击，将其击退。

name: Osada/阿贞
text: Th-thank you!
trans: 啊，谢谢！

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Quick! Get into the house!
trans: 这边！快进来屋里！

name: Garoza/加罗萨
text: G-gotcha!
trans: 哦，噢！

name: X-Factor Sliver/何物的碎片
text: Ouugh... Ooo!
trans: 呜呜……哦哦哦！

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: Those rampaging monsters are going to end up destroying the estate!
trans: 要是放任这个怪物不管的话这里会被毁掉的！

name: Sevilbarra/萨比尔巴拉
text: We must engage and drive them away, 姬塔!
trans: 姬塔，一口气把它们干掉！
